videoData.title: Sound and sentiment

nodes.whoTheyAre: Award winning, UK-based composer, artist and performer Mira Calix incorporates her electronic style with classical orchestration into her work for installation pieces, film soundtracks, theatre and opera. Calix is a regular contributor to Intel’s Creators Project which focuses on advancing the research within Intel Labs on emotional connectedness through technology and media.

videoData.description: What does happiness sound like? What about misery? Musician Mira Calix explores the emotional qualities embedded in music and noise and shares a sound-based spectrum of human sentiments that emerged from her work.
videoData.socialDescription: What does happiness sound like? What about misery? Musician Mira Calix explores the emotional qualities embedded in music and noise and shares a sound-based spectrum of human sentiments that emerged from her work.
